home.paragraph: Listen your favourite musics and enjoy. Upload them to this website. Share with others. Leave comments. To add music first of all you should login or register yourself. After that you can also manage your musics. Do not forget to leave you comments. Enjoy!

manage.confirm: You have unsaved changes. Are you shure you want to leave ?

composition.alertError: Something went wrong! Try again later.

login.alertWait: Please wait! We are logging you in.
login.alertSuccess: Success! You are now logged in.

register.alertWait: Please wait! Your account is being created.
register.alertError: An uxpected error occured. Please try again later.
register.alertSuccess: Success! Your account has been created.
